page.title: 20INTERVIEWS
page.content: ONE GROUP INTERVIEWED OLD PEOPLE IN EDMONTON. THEY ASKED 'WHAT CHANGES YOU WOULD LIKE TO SEE IN NEXT 50 YEARS?'. (1) The most important change I'd like to see is to get rid of all the immigrants. Secondly I'd like all the tower blocks and sky scrapers knocked down. Thirdly, I'd like our streets to be safer at night and for the police to prevent muggings and rapes. Old lady aged 90. (2) The ugly flats and overcrowding in Edmonton Green should be spread out more. "The tower blocks are like rabbit huts way up there in the sky cut off from nature". Lady aged 75 These are some of the changes 9/10 year olds wish to see:_More jobs for unemployed,care for wildlife,starving in Africa to be given food,less vandalism,and cure for Cancer.
